TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventLogWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public NotInheritable Class EventLogWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class EventLogWebEventProvider sealed : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 实现事件提供程序，该程序将 ASP.NET 状况监视事件记录到 Windows 应用程序事件日志中。

span.span: Implements an event provider that logs ASP.NET health-monitoring events into the Windows Application Event Log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 默认情况下， (启用) 配置、失败审核和错误运行状况监视事件。The , the failure audit, and the error health-monitoring events are configured (enabled) by default. 这意味着默认情况下，故障审核和错误运行状况监视事件记录在 Windows 应用程序事件日志中。This means that the failure audit and the error health-monitoring events are logged in the Windows Application Event Log by default. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例，请参阅 [如何：实现运行状况监视自定义提供程序示例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms178718(v=vs.140))。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms178718(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的配置文件节选显示了如何指定类型的提供程序 来处理成功审核事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to specify a provider of type to handle success audit events. 默认情况下，将配置要监视的和失败审核运行状况事件类型。The and the failure audit health-event types to monitor are configured by default. 若要监视成功审核，需要对其进行配置，如示例代码所示。To monitor the success audits, you need to configure them, as shown in the example code. ``` ```

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述
ASP.NET 运行状况-监视自定义提供程序示例
安装和配置 ASP.NET 提供程序

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 将事件从提供程序缓冲区移到事件日志中。

span.span: Moves events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，无论自上次写入以来经过了多少时间或缓冲区中有多少事件，提供程序的缓冲区中的所有事件都将立即写入 Windows 应用程序事件日志。When this method is called, all the events in the provider's buffer are immediately written to the Windows Application Event Log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 上次写入的时间将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. 如果未启用缓冲机制，则调用此方法不会产生任何影响。If the buffering mechanism is not enabled, calling this method does not have any effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 一个 ，指定配置文件中为此提供程序分配的特性。

span.span: A that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以 通过配置文件中指定的配置设置和名称初始化。This method is called to initialize the with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用来开始处理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 在 承载 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止时调用方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 调用方法来执行允许应用程序正常结束的任务。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
